Snow possible this weekend

For a third weekend, the forecast holds the possibility of a snowstorm that could bring heavy snow across the interior and a rain-snow mix along the coast. (9:40 a.m.)
  • Weather Wisdom: Stormy again this weekend
  • Watch WBZ weather forecast  |  Check full forecast

Office Depot agrees to buy OfficeMax

The all-stock deal valued at $1.2 billion would combine the No. 2 and No. 3 office supply retailers and could benefit Staples, the largest office retailer. (9:11 a.m.)

Patrick wraps up trade mission

Deval Patrick is finishing up his trade mission to Colombia, but he's not headed back home just yet. Patrick and his wife Diane are scheduled to leave Colombia Wednesday and head to Florida for a few days of vacation.

Business

Yahoo redesigns its site

Yahoo is renovating the main entry into its website in an effort to get people to visit more frequently and linger for longer periods of time. The makeover is the most notable change to the website since Marissa Mayer became CEO.
